MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00am to make repairs to the overhead line network after recent bird strikes in the area, and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.04am on the 16th of November 2020.
